attributes.action: Reduce the duty on fuel to stop fuel poverty
attributes.additional_details: Because its the government that is charging the duty, you have the power to reduce it
attributes.background: We want a reduction in the duty charged on fuels, Crippling prices at the pumps are sending people into poverty and this needs to stop now

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

If you want fuel duty to be reduced by a specific amount, but not removed completely, we could accept a petition requesting this.
